remarks: Addition of nonnegative and positive numbers is positive. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
leidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltnegd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
addgegt0d.3 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
addgegt0d.4 $e |- ( ph -> 0 < B ) $.
addgegt0d $p |- ( ph -> 0 < ( A + B ) ) $.
